    Tarantulas looked in panic at the Fuzor that blocked his path. He had 
failed in an easy escape, so he would have to make a little noise. He turned 
to see Aerostreak loading his pistol, getting ready to fire at him.
    "I said stand back! I will---OH NO!" She rhasped in his voice as 
Aerostreak fired a shot, blowing off his head which bounced across the floor. 
His body stumbled around feeling for its head.
    "Commander Quickstrike, Paralysis and Black Aracnia need to get to a CR 
chamber. I'll put Tarantulas in the Brig." Aerostreak said as Grappler and 
Guantix arrived on the scene and awaited Quickstrikes orders.

    Aerostreak placed Tarantulas in the cell across from the Maximlas there, 
and left no even saying a word to his former commrads. In the cell the body 
still flet around for its head that laid up-side-down.
    "Damn that widow! She will pay!" He said as he replaced his head and 
looked to the Maximals. A thought occured in his head, and he decided to 
begin communication.
    "Maximals! Why are you here?" He demanded, his body pressing agianst the 
force feild so he could get a better look at the threesome.
    Nighteyes didnt trust him to much, but being mean didnt get anyone 
anywhere. "Our brothers and sister joined the Predacons, and we've been here 
ever scince. I think a week or two." She said.
    Tarantulas began to laugh, a rhaspy cold laugh. "I think we'll get along 
just fine then. Hahahahahhahaha!"
